data.title: Confirmed Bigg Boss 18 Contestants 2024: Name List and Complete Details
data.meta_description: Discover the Bigg Boss 18 contestants list for 2024! From Shoaib Ibrahim to Fukra Insaan, get all the details and photos. Catch the action on Colors TV and JioCinema!
data.text:
Bigg Boss 18 Contestants: After the monumental success of its previous seasons, the popular reality show Bigg Boss is making a grand return with Bigg Boss Season 18 in 2024. This time, the stakes are higher, the drama is intense, and the entertainment quotient promises to be off the charts. Bigg Boss Season 18 is set to air from September on Colors TV and the JioCinema app, and fans are eagerly waiting to see the new batch of contestants enter the house.

In this blog post, we’ll provide you with a comprehensive list of Bigg Boss 18 contestants along with their photos, so you can get to know them before the show begins. For those unfamiliar, Bigg Boss is based on the Dutch reality game show Big Brother and has been a household name in India. Over the years, the show has seen various hosts, including Arshad Warsi, Shilpa Shetty, Amitabh Bachchan, Sanjay Dutt, Farah Khan, Karan Johar, and the most iconic host, Salman Khan.

Meet the Bigg Boss 18 Contestants

Shoaib Ibrahim

Shoaib Ibrahim is a well-known television actor who has captured the hearts of many with his performances in popular serials. His charming personality and strong fan base make him a formidable contestant.

Sameera Reddy

A Bollywood actress with a significant following, Sameera Reddy is known for her roles in various films and her candid personality. Her entry into the Bigg Boss 18 Contestants house is highly anticipated.

Kashish Kapoor

An up-and-coming actor, Kashish Kapoor is all set to make his mark in the Bigg Boss house. His good looks and acting chops will surely be a topic of discussion among the housemates.

Zayn Saifi

Known for his entertaining videos, Zayn Saifi is another social media star joining the Bigg Boss 18 lineup. His comedic skills and vibrant personality will be a hit in the house.

Pooja Sharma & Rekha

Known for her powerful roles in television dramas, Pooja Sharma brings a lot of grace and grit to the show. Her journey in the Bigg Boss house will be interesting to follow. A legendary actress in Indian cinema, Rekha needs no introduction. Her entry into the Bigg Boss 18 Contestants house is sure to bring a lot of elegance and poise, along with some intriguing dynamics.

Dolly Chaiwala

A popular social media influencer, Dolly Chaiwala has a unique style and personality that her followers adore. She is expected to add a lot of fun and flair to the show.

Digvijay Singh Rathee

An entrepreneur and motivational speaker, Digvijay Singh Rathee will bring a different perspective to the Bigg Boss house. His presence is sure to spark some deep conversations and debates.

Faisel Sheikh (Mr. Faisu)

A social media sensation and influencer, Faisel Sheikh, also known as Mr. Faisu, has millions of followers who adore his content. His journey in the Bigg Boss house will be closely watched.

Fukra Insaan (Abhishek Malhan)

A YouTube star, Fukra Insaan, aka Abhishek Malhan, is known for his prank videos and humorous content. His presence in the Bigg Boss house is expected to add a lot of laughter and light moments.

Sheezan Khan

A television actor known for his roles in popular serials, Sheezan Khan brings a lot of talent and charisma to the Bigg Boss house. His interactions with other contestants will be interesting to watch.

Dalljiet Kaur

An actress and reality TV star, Dalljiet Kaur has a strong fan base and is known for her resilience. Her stint in the Bigg Boss house will be one to watch out for.

Deepika Arya

A model and actress, Deepika Arya brings glamour and sophistication to the show. Her journey in the house will be closely followed by fans.

Nusrat Jahan

An actress and politician, Nusrat Jahan is known for her strong opinions and charismatic personality. Her presence in the Bigg Boss house is sure to stir some interesting discussions.

Alice Kaushik

A young actress making waves in the television industry, Alice Kaushik is set to bring her charm and talent to the Bigg Boss 18 Contestants house.

Harsh Beniwal

A popular YouTuber and comedian, Harsh Beniwal is known for his hilarious videos and sketches. His entry into the Bigg Boss 18 Contestants house will surely keep the audience entertained.

Surbhi Jyoti

A television actress known for her roles in hit serials, Surbhi Jyoti has a huge fan following. Her interactions and strategies in the Bigg Boss house will be keenly observed.

Karan Patel

A renowned television actor, Karan Patel is known for his intense roles and strong screen presence. His entry into the Bigg Boss house is highly anticipated.

Somy Ali

A former Bollywood actress and activist, Somy Ali brings a unique perspective to the show. Her experiences and journey in the house will be fascinating to watch.

What to Expect from Bigg Boss 18

With such a diverse and dynamic group of contestants, Bigg Boss 18 promises to be a roller-coaster ride of emotions, drama, and entertainment. The show’s format, which includes tasks, nominations, and evictions, will test the contestants’ patience, resilience, and social skills.

Host and Streaming Details

Salman Khan, who has become synonymous with Bigg Boss, will continue to host the show, bringing his unique style and wit to the weekend episodes. The show will be available for viewing on Colors TV and can be streamed on the JioCinema app, making it accessible to a wide audience.

The premiere of the show is scheduled for October 5th, 2024. The show will air at 10:00 PM from Monday to Friday, and at 9:00 PM on Saturday and Sunday for the Weekend Ka Vaar episodes.

Final Thoughts

Bigg Boss 18 Contestants is all set to be a spectacular season with an eclectic mix of contestants from various backgrounds. Whether you are a fan of television dramas, Bollywood, or social media influencers, this season has something for everyone. Stay tuned and get ready for the drama, excitement, and endless entertainment that bigg boss season 18 promises to deliver.

As the countdown to the new season begins, make sure to keep an eye out for more updates and exclusive content related to Bigg Boss 18. Let the Bigg Boss 18 Contestants fever begin!
